title: Ketu Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the eighth house triggers deep detachment from fear, control, and dependency for Leo ascendants. Sudden changes, emotional purging, and karmic closures surface quietly. Interest in occult, healing, or inner research increases, while shared finances require caution. This phase favors surrender over control. When discipline and transparency guide actions, Ketu grants profound inner transformation and resilience through acceptance.

sections.heading: Career
points: Strength in research, healing, or investigation
Low visibility but deep impact roles

closing: This transit dissolves hidden fears. By releasing control, Ketu reveals enduring strength and inner freedom.
